title: Reality Shifter

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: > Shift someone into a different dimension, making them Shifted.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> Shifted players are dead but appear alive. Votes needed to execute someone will secretly be lowered. If someone tries to attack a Shifted player, they will be told the player has defense.
> If the town tries to execute a Shifted player, they will be told the execution failed.
> When you die, all Shifted players are revealed to be dead.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: > Have you and your Shifted players outnumber the living players.

desc:
Post 3599
*"Seems I shifted into the Golem Reality."*
